column4: welcome everybody, i am googling for a week and a half and can not find solution
i have hp pavilion dv5 1110 - my problems are sound throug hdmi, suspend and remote control
I thought ubottu would pick up on that !sound

though this may or may not help but someone gave me this to try to help get 5.1 (I haven't tried this yet) Setting 5.1 sound in Ubuntu Hardy <http://74.125.47.102/translate_c?hl=en&sl=auto&tl=en&u=http://www.cristalab.com/tips/configurar-sonido-5.1-en-ubuntu-hardy-c55716l/&prev=hp&usg=ALkJrhhOdNjR8Uqh74R0K6aWG5G8KhWh3w>
that was a google link -- The original page was in spanish-- so you may want to goto the spanish page and then copy that link over to google translate
this is the spanish link Configurar sonido 5.1 en Ubuntu Hardy <http://www.cristalab.com/tips/configurar-sonido-5.1-en-ubuntu-hardy-c55716l/>
you may want to copy that link over to google translate

as far as your remote control -- I don't have a clue-- you may also try going to alsa site and see if there are updated drivers (or there you may find clues to configure your Hdmi better) Main Page - AlsaProject <http://www.alsa-project.org/main/index.php/Main_Page>
i have newest alsa and nvidia drivers; i am fighting with problem for a long time
my remote control works as if it is part of keyboard
